price: A kò sì rí nínú (ìlú náà) yàtọ̀ sí ilé kan tó jẹ́ ti àwọn mùsùlùmí.
arabic: فَمَا وَجَدۡنَا فِيهَا غَيۡرَ بَيۡتٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: famā wajadnā fīhā ghayra baytin mina al-mus'limīna
